nodes.name: Card Golf Tour
nodes.risks: Game components include playing cards, instructional material and scorecards that are printed and shipped. Supply chain challenges that have increased over the past few years have introduced fulfillment risks in terms of shipping delays. We have vetted our printing partner through references from other card game creators and are confident our printing partner will be able to fulfill orders according to schedule.
nodes.story:
What Is Card Golf Tour?

Card Golf Tour is a project developed by me (Nick Sahrmann) and my brother (Luke Sahrmann). We have always had great interest in both golf and card games. Our grandparents introduced us to the card game "Card Golf" a couple years back, and we instantly loved it. However, after over a year of playing the game, we thought to ourselves - "there must be a way to make card golf more competitive and play more like the actual game of golf." Thus, Card Golf Tour was born.  

Card Golf Tour improves on the traditional game of card golf by introducing: 

  • A deck of playing cards that replicates a set of golf clubs.
  • An innovative scoring system that allows players to score eagles, birdies, pars, and bogeys.
  • A unique par system that changes the duration of the hand.
  • An optional proprietary stroke index system that varies the difficulty level from hand to hand.
  • Multiple game formats, including scramble, alternate shot, and match play.

Our mission with Card Golf Tour is twofold; We want to help people learn about the game of golf while also creating a competitive and strategic card game that appeals to avid golfers and card players alike. We are running our Kickstarter campaign to raise funds for the production of our first 100 units of Card Golf Tour. To learn more about Card Golf Tour, visit our website at https://cardgolftour.com/.

Meet The Team

Nick Sahrmann - Freshman at the University of Kansas

Luke Sahrmann - Junior at Olathe West High School

Components

Each copy of Card Golf Tour includes the following items:

  • 2 decks of Card Golf Tour playing cards (54 cards in each deck)
  • 4 Card Golf Tour scorecards
  • 1 Instruction Guide
  • 1 Dice
  • 1 Pencil

How To Play

The aim of the game in Card Golf Tour is to shoot par or better (minimize your point total) on each hole (hand) by strategically drawing, matching, keeping, and discarding cards. Card Golf Tour is designed to be played with a group of 2-5 players and will take anywhere from 10-90 minutes based on the amount of hands you play. Listed is below is a brief guide to Card Golf Tour as well as an instructional video on our YouTube channel.

Note: Composition of the deck

Each deck of Card Golf Tour playing cards includes 54 cards. There are 14 types of cards in the deck:

  • Putter (-5 points)
  • Driver (-2 points)
  • Hybrid (0 points)
  • 1 Iron (1 point)
  • 2 Iron (2 points)
  • 3 Iron (3 points)
  • 4 Iron (4 points)
  • 5 Iron (5 points)
  • 6 Iron (6 points)
  • 7 Iron (7 points)
  • 8 Iron (8 points)
  • 9 Iron (9 points)
  • Pitching Wedge (10 points)
  • Sand Wedge (11 points)

Each type of card has 4 cards in the deck, 2 green cards of the respective type and 2 black cards. The exception to this is the putter card, in which there are only two putters in the deck, one black putter and one green putter (think of the putter as the joker of a standard deck of playing cards).

In Card Golf Tour, the lower the point value of the card, the more valuable that card is. This means that the putter is typically the best card in the deck while the sand wedge is typically the worst card in the deck.

Setup:

Step 1- The dealer will shuffle the deck of cards and then deal. Each player will be dealt 4, 6, or 8 cards face down based on the par of the hole (dealer will reference the scorecard for the par of the hole). 

Step 2- The dealer will then place the remaining cards in the the center of the table, forming the draw pile. The top card of the draw pile will then be turned over and placed next to the draw pile forming the discard pile. 

Step 3- Each player will arrange their cards in two horizontal rows of 2, 3, or 4 cards based on how many cards they were dealt. They will then chose 1, 2, or 3 cards to turn face up based on the amount of cards they were dealt. 

Play:

Step 1- Each player will roll the dice to determine order of play. The lowest roll will be player 1, and the lowest dice roll between the player to the right and left of player 1 will be player 2. Play will then continue in this direction for the remainder of the hole. 

Step 2- Through a series of drawing, matching, keeping, and discarding cards players will attempt to minimize their hands point total (see our instructional video attached below for further explanation of this facet of the game). 

Step 3- Once one player has all of their cards face up on the table, the hand ends and each remaining player is allowed one more turn. 

Score:

Step 1- Each player will find the sum of their hand. 

Step 2- Each player will then find the score to par that their hand total falls under (see our instructional video below for further information on the scoring system in Card Golf Tour). 

Step 3- Each player will then report their score on the hole to the scorekeeper who will keep a running tally of each players score throughout the round.

Note- Each step outlined above will be repeated for each subsequent hand in the game. It is recommended that the group plays either 9 or 18 hands, just like how golfers usually play 9 or 18 holes in a round.

At the conclusion of the game, the player with the lowest score is the winner!

Instructional Video:

What Tour Players Are Saying...

Stretch Goals

At Card Golf Tour, we have decided not to use stretch goals as a part of our crowdfunding campaign. Our reasoning for this is simple.

We want to ensure that each backer who pledges to the campaign will be able to open their box and immediately begin playing Card Golf Tour. Some Kickstarter campaigns withhold certain components of their game and use them as a reward for a stretch goal. At Card Golf Tour, we have designed our game holistically so that no add-ons are necessary in order to play our game. While we have designed many different ways to play Card Golf Tour, we have decided that we will release these updates to the game at scheduled times throughout the upcoming year to keep the game feeling new and exciting. 

Our team at Card Golf Tour is using our Kickstarter campaign as a proof of concept campaign. We do not intend to make a profit on our product using Kickstarter, but rather, want to use our campaign to spread awareness about our game. Card Golf Tour is a hobby for us, not a job.

Shipping

Our team at Card Golf Tour has made the decision to only ship within the United States. Shipping will be $5 to anywhere within the U.S and no matter the pledge level. 

Backers may notice that we have set March 2024 as our targeted delivery date for our product. This is an unusually short turnaround as our campaign will be ending on February 25th. The reason for this is that we have already produced our first 100 copies of Card Golf Tour. This means that once the campaign ends, assuming it has met its goal, we will be able to immediately begin the process of shipping out our game to backers. While we anticipate that shipping will take 1-2 weeks, we cannot guarantee anything and will make sure to provide continued updates as needed.

nodes.question: Where will the game be released when it is completed?

nodes.answer: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Japanese and Korean. We will add other languages according to the actual situation.

nodes.name: ShadowKnight
nodes.risks:
The core concept of "ShadowKnight" aims to provide players with an unprecedented and challenging gaming experience. Our goal is to transcend the boundaries of traditional action games by introducing innovative soul-possession mechanics and a complex combat system. This ambitious objective brings significant technical and design challenges. To achieve this vision, our team is committed to relentless effort, continuous innovation, and refinement, ensuring the balance of game mechanics and the coherence of the story.
Our team faces certain limitations in art and animation. High-quality visuals are a key factor in attracting players, especially in action soul games, where exquisite graphics and smooth animations are crucial. We recognize this and are actively seeking partnerships and external resources to address this shortcoming. We are dedicated to ensuring that the game's visuals meet industry standards, providing players with an immersive gaming experience.
To realize the highly interactive and dynamic combat scenes envisioned in "ShadowKnight", complex and advanced programming techniques are required. The challenge lies in accurately implementing the game's intricate state system and high-intelligence AI, while maintaining the game's fluidity and stability. Our team is facing the need for innovation and breakthroughs at the technical level.
In the end, no matter how much we raise, we will deliver.
nodes.story:
"ShadowKnight" is a Soulslike action game. The story unfolds in a mysterious and perilous unknown territory, where a small squad of brave knights encounters unknown monsters, leading to a catastrophic defeat. The protagonist, the lone survivor, unexpectedly gains a mystical power from wearing Pazuzu's possession talisman. After the monsters depart, you discover a unique ability: you can use your soul to inhabit the bodies of the deceased. You will use your soul to choose a new body (different professions) from your team to begin the journey of escaping this uncharted domain.

Game Features

Unique Possession Mechanism

  • In "ShadowKnight", players are reborn in a soul state after each death.
  • In the soul state, players can choose to possess either corpses or weaker living bodies.
  • The game offers three slots for players to permanently save different bodies.
  • By consuming soul shards, players can possess stored bodies directly in the soul state.

Body Diversity and Combat Variability

  • Every possessable creature in the game has unique base attributes and skills, offering rich combat experiences and strategic choices.
  • The weapon attack customization mechanism allows players to adjust their combat style to their preference, offering greater freedom in gameplay.
  • Different creatures have varying equipment and item usage restrictions, adding strategy and depth to the game.

Intelligent AI and Diverse Enemies

  • Enemy AI is designed to consider various combat environments and situations, making each battle challenging and unpredictable.
  • Interactions among enemies make combat more intense and strategic, forcing players to continually adjust tactics against different enemy combinations.
  • Each enemy in the game has its unique behavior pattern and combat strategy, requiring players to continuously learn and adapt.

Multiple Endings and Story Depth

  • The story development and endings of "ShadowKnight" change based on player choices and actions, offering a highly non-linear gaming experience.
  • Players' decisions not only affect the story's direction but also influence relationships between characters and the state of the world.
  • Every choice in the game involves moral and strategic considerations, adding to the story's complexity and immersion.

Interactive Combat Scenes

  • Combat environments offer a variety of interactive elements; players can use terrain advantages or environmental traps against enemies.
  • Each combat scene is meticulously designed to provide unique tactical challenges and opportunities.
  • Interactive elements in scenes not only add strategic depth to combat but also enhance exploration fun and surprises.

Combat Mechanics

Complex State System

  • The game introduces a stagger bar, rigidity bar, and defense bar, adding more layers and depth to combat.
  • Different state effects like falling, grounding, knockback, and launching add extra strategic elements to combat, offering more tactical choices and responses.

Rich Attack Types and Tactical Choices

  • The game offers various attack types, such as thrusting, cleaving, sweeping, stabbing, and lifting. Each attack type has its specific scenarios and effects.
  • Specific attack types have extra effects on certain enemies or combat states, like thrusting attacks being more effective against enemies in front of walls, and cleaving attacks causing more damage to grounded enemies.
  • Combat strategies are rich; players need to choose attack methods flexibly based on enemy types and combat environments.

Unique Guard-Breaking Attacks and Combat Interactions

  • Guard-breaking attacks (charged skills) add an extra strategic layer to combat; these attacks can't be blocked by normal defense and have additional effects on defensive enemies.
  • The game encourages players to find enemies' weaknesses through observation and adaptation, using guard-breaking attacks to break stalemates.
  • Combat interactions and reaction timings require players to stay alert and flexible, increasing the game's challenge and enjoyment.

nodes.question: What is a pledge?
nodes.answer:
A Kickstarter pledge refers to a financial commitment made by an individual or backer to support a creative project listed on the Kickstarter crowdfunding platform. When a project creator launches a campaign on Kickstarter, they set a funding goal and offer various reward tiers for backers who pledge different amounts of money.

Backers can choose a specific reward tier and pledge the corresponding amount of money to help the project reach its funding goal. In return, they often receive rewards such as early access to the product, exclusive merchandise, or other incentives based on the amount pledged. If the project successfully reaches or exceeds its funding goal by the campaign deadline, backers' pledges are collected, and the project creator uses the funds to bring their idea to fruition.

nodes.question: What happens if the campaign is successful?
nodes.answer: Kickstarter operates on an all-or-nothing funding model. If a project is successfully funded, and the fundraising goal is met within the set timeframe, Kickstarter collects the pledged funds from backers, and the project creator receives the funds to work on their project.

nodes.question: If the campaign is unsuccessful, are my funds returned?
nodes.answer: If a project does not reach its funding goal by the specified deadline, no money is collected from backers, and the project creator does not receive any funds. In such cases, backers are not charged, and there is no need for Kickstarter to issue refunds since no transactions take place.

nodes.name: She Loves Me (Not)
nodes.risks:
The main challenge for us is our budget. In order to get this game off the ground we need people to support it so we can manufacture and ship the game to you!

We understand there are challenges that arise with Kickstarter projects. Kickstarter creators often fail to deliver a product on time due to unforeseen events. Whatever difficulties present, we will address them with open and honest communication so that backers understand exactly what's happening.

We want our game on your tabletops, so we will do everything it takes to get them them into your hands.
nodes.story:
She Loves Me (Not) is a party game for creating pick-up and break-up lines based around characters drawn from a deck of cards. The game is designed as a way for 3-8 players to creatively express themselves and to share laughs with friends.

  1. Draw 12 character cards from the pile and place them face down on the game board. The judge for the first round is the player who had the most recent change in relationship status. The judge will draw one of the cards off of the board and place down the heart coin. The heart coin indicates whether players write a pick-up or break-up line.
  1. If the whole heart side of the heart coin is facing up all remaining players will create their own pick-up line to use on the character revealed. In the example above "Doctor" is revealed, so all players will write a pick-up line to use on a doctor.
  1. The judge will pick their favorite response and the player who wrote the line keeps the "Doctor" character card as a point. A new player will become the judge and turn the heat coin to the broken heart side of the coin for the next round. The remaining players will now create a break-up line for the next character card drawn. Rounds switch between pick-up and break-up lines.
  1. At the end of the game, the player with the most cards wins. 
  1. (1) Box
  2. (1) Instruction Leaflet
  3. (1) Game Board
  4. (1) Game Token
  5. (180) Character Cards
  6. (8) Response Pads
  7. (8) Erasable Markers

Want help impressing a crush? Or simply hoping for a gag call to a friend? Let us rizz on your behalf. Pick this pledge for a personalized pick-up line from the creators to a person of interest.

Don't have the guts to break up with your pesky boyfriend or girlfriend? We'll use a personalized break-up line on your soon to be ex. Don't worry, we'll let them down easy.

Once certain campaign milestones have been met, all copies of our game will be upgraded to higher quality material as described below.

$15,000: Heart Coin Upgrade

The game token will be upgraded from a standard laminated material to a higher quality wooden disk.

$40,000: Character Card Upgrade

Character cards will be made from a heavier weighted cardstock.

$100,000: Game Box Upgrade

We'll upgrade the game box to include gold foil and spot UV coating.

1.0 - Campaign: 2024-02-13

The completion of our campaign will be the next major step in our journey. Please keep in mind that this is our first campaign at TNT Games. We know we are going to make mistakes along the way and will run into obstacles that we were not expecting, however we promise we will be transparent and keep you informed of any situations that do arise. 

2.0 - Final Artwork: 3-4 weeks after campaign ends

Please note that the artwork in this campaign is preliminary. We have heard many complaints regarding the color of the box. We plan to share some updates near the end of the campaign with improvements to the artwork we think you will love.

3.0 - Manufacturing

Manufacturer will need some prep time to review final artwork, tool the factory line, and perform necessary quality control processes and material testing. We are hopeful

4.0 - Pledge Manager: April 2024

Our 3rd party pledge manager will reach out to confirm addresses, pledge levels and give you the opportunity to update your order before shipping begins

5.0 - Transit:

The games will have to make their way overseas from the manufacturer to our partnered distributer in the States. This process can take 3-6 weeks.

6.0 - Shipping

Our distributor works with the pledge manager to make sure all orders are shipped in a timely manner.

7.0 - Delivered: Targeting November 2024

Final shipping and tax price will be determined with our 3rd party pledge manager once we have final weights from the manufacturer, but estimates are shown below. We promise to keep shipping costs as low as possible.

US - $10 USD

CA - $14 USD

EU - $25 USD

Again, all prices above are estimates and subject to change. Right now we anticipate transporting all games to our sole distributing partner in the States, however if we have enough support from backers in other parts of the world, such as EU for an example, then we will pursue additional distribution partners in those regions to help reduce costs.

Let us be the first to welcome you to Kickstarter. Regardless if you joined specifically to back our project or to be apart of this platform in general, we are so thankful you have joined us thus far. Below is the next steps that occur for you in this process.

1.0 - Pledge Selection

Choose the pledge level that best matches your interests and budget. Any pledge helps make our dream of bringing She Loves Me (Not) to peoples' homes a reality.

2.0 - Collection

Collection only occurs at the end of the campaign if we have successfully reached our funding goal. At that point, Kickstarter will collect the amount agreed to in your pledge. If we do not reach our funding goal then you will not be charged, but unfortunately you won't be receiving your copy of the game either.

3.0 - Pledge Manager

Our 3rd party pledge manager will be opened up in April. This is where you have the opportunity to update your order, confirm shipping address, and pay for shipping.

4.0 - Updates

During the manufacturing process, we will provide updates to inform you with all the latest progress of our game. Expect updates to come out on a monthly basis at minimum, but we will also do our best to inform you as soon as we reach any major milestones or encounter any setbacks.

5.0 - Delivery

The game goes through several hands as it makes its way from the manufacturer to your living room. We will continue to provide you updates during this time.

6.0 - Enjoy!

Once your copy of She Loves Me (Not) arrives, it is time to gather your family and friends and share in a heartfelt laugh.

We love to support Friendly Local Game Stores and would be honored to see She Loves Me (Not) in your store soon. We have included a base option of (20) games if you would like to support us during the campaign, but please reach out to us after the campaign if you have any questions or would like to order an alternative quantity. We would be happy to work with you.

nodes.name: GREENHORNS: A Weird Space RPG
nodes.risks:
The largest risks have to do with production. Every self-publisher is at the hands of printers and their supply chains. All shipping costs are estimates and may be higher when fulfillment comes. We will stay in communication about rates when it is closer to shipping times.
We have baked in an additional 30 days in the fulfillment calendar to account for any delays or sickness our small team may experience.
nodes.story:
Welcome to Greenhorns: A Weird Space RPG. This is a dangerously fast rules-lite roleplaying game where you create planets, hunt bounties, and survive the strange.

Greenhorns is a roleplaying game where you play as powerful Kruxians bringing new life into the cosmos and protecting your home planet from rogue vengeful anomalies. Beware! It's a pretty dangerous job. After all, there's a reason you're all greenhorns.

Planet creation missions feel like dungeon diving. Bounty hunting missions challenge the crew to topple enemy schemes and eliminate lethal adversaries. And Kruxor, the crew's home planet, is an everchanging sandbox location that provides prominent factions and opportunities for developing your characters.

The ~100 page hardcover contains player-facing rules that fit on the character sheet, 13+ missions, and dozens of hours of gameplay. Greenhorns is designed for 3-6 players including the GM.

Try Greenhorns: A Weird Space RPG now! 
30-page Quickstart with ready-to-play planet layers!

Greenhorns Features

  • 8 Uncanny Classes including Light Witch, Void Magician, Force Flyer, Conjure Mage and more.
  • 6 Modular Planet Layers with 12 unique "dungeon" maps.
  • A Bounty Hunting Mini-Campaign written by Christian Sorrell.
  • Several Job Boards that combine planet layers to create dozens of planets, announce new bounties, and offer assignments on Kruxor.
  • Guidance for  Running the Game + Narrative Tools.
  • Kruxor, the crew's home planet, is a sandbox location including 10+ locations and multiple factions.
  • Expanded Material for Each Class including favored weapons & gear, clubs & gangs, hobbies & hangouts, and more.
  • Dozens of Random Tables that provide gear, weapons, encounters on Kruxor, expand the possibilities during character creation, and more.
  • 12 Full Page Illustrations by Diego Acevedo.
  • 60+ Threats, 19 !!Bosses!!, 35+ NPCs.

Greenhorns is built on the chassis of the Together We Go system created by Markus Linderum and developed by Tony Vasinda. Together We Go marries OSR adventure gaming that rewards clever choices over firing guns blazing and narrative mechanics that enhance shared storytelling. It's a system I fell in love with, recommend checking out, and made a few significant changes to facilitate faster combat and more heroic moments you'd expect when going into the cosmos to create planets.

While keeping the spirit of encouraging players to traverse with care, players now auto-hit with every attack and often deal more damage when attacking. Skills are also bolstered so players are more capable of moving forward through the planet layer maps and hunting down bounties. PCs are now downed when they take Max Hits and die when they suffer Max+2 Hits.

The trade off is rolling below an enemy's difficulty results in complications and put players at risk of counter attacks. The lethality remains with larger maps which offer more encounters, enemies with more health, and more opportunities for enemies to deal more damage during combat. More or less, Greenhorns is a game of glass cannons.

The fantastic narrative elements from Together We Go are largely kept and slightly expanded to allow the crew to revel in their creations. The crew defines the loot they find and reflect on the parts of the planet they experienced after the planet creation missions are completed. Together, players define the records engraved in their loot that tell the stories of specific moments in the planet's history and foretell the planet's future events.

Greenhorn's classes are easy to pick up and exciting to play without context. It's important to us that classes are also deep enough for players to explore throughout play. 

The Greenhorns Class Booster is a player-facing 16-page zine full of random tables that expand class backgrounds and interests. Half of the tables exist in the core book while the other half are unique to the Class Booster. Some illustrations are also shared from the core book for players who love references.

The Class Booster random tables offer alternative skill sparks, legends & heroes and how they used their powers, favored weapons & gear, hangouts & organizations on Kruxor, and more.

We're ecstatic to be offering prints for Greenhorns! These prints will be printed on high quality paper, rolled, and shipped in a separate tube with your order. We are subsidizing shipping during the campaign and have a third poster planned as a stretch goal for all backers who pledged for these two posters*!

Choose Your Character Print celebrates the four core classes of Greenhorns. From top left to bottom right, The Blast Master, Potion Doser, Conjure Mage, and Light Witch.

The Creatora Machinika Print celebrates The Great Machine that the crew guides during planet creation missions.

The Creatora Machinika splits and duplicates itself so it can exist throughout Kruxor and accompany many crews on simultaneous missions. The Great Machine is benevolent to all of its creations and does not interfere or aid Greenhorns on their missions. Diego illustrated several forms that the Creatora Machinika takes and they are all featured on this poster.

*To minimize shipping risks, prints are only available domestically in the US during the campaign. After the campaign we will be searching for solutions that provide international backers the opportunity to purchase posters at similar prices as the Kickstarter (including the third print if it is unlocked as a stretch goal).

**Please note that the posters are currently works-in-progress and will experience some upgrades before final printing. 

Marco Serrano (Game Design, Writing, Layout) runs Spicy Tuna RPG and had the pleasure of managing the development of Greenhorns. Marco's latest writings include Outsourced: The Luko Fin Corp Deception, Constant Downpour Remastered, and A Butterfly Dies. You can stay up to date with his and Spicy Tuna's releases at theguac.substack.com.

Diego Acevedo (D3A) (Illustration) is a visual artist working on illustration and animation from his natal city of Querétaro, México. He has directed several short films, including his latest one “Emme in her mutant days”, currently being shown at festivals around the world. He’s self-publishing “Cordillera”, a horror adventure comic book.

Christian Sorrell (he/they) (Bounty Hunting Mission Writing), known online as MeatCastle, is the creator of Tacticians of Ahm, a variety of Mothership modules like The Bloodfields on Blackstar Station, and also created supplements for Mork Borg, Liminal Horror, and other indie TTRPGS. Additionally, Christian does a variety of TTRPG freelance adventure writing, editing, and game development. You can find Christian's work at http://meatcastlegameware.com/.

Walton Wood (Editing, Proofreading) made lots of bad life choices and now works full time as an editor of RPG content for Spicy Tuna RPG, Stockholm Kartell, Creature Curation, Worlds of Quiroga, Games Omnivorous, and many other small publishers and independent creators. He’s a cofounder of Ex Libris RPG, a platform for cataloguing third-party RPG content, and of Bogfolk, an indie publishing cooperative. Sometimes, he also blogs at http://liberludorum.com and interviews creators on the companion podcast, Loqui Ludos.

Watch the Greenhorns Actual Play on 
The Weekly Scroll

Watch the Greenhorns Game Pitch on 
Dieku Games

PLEASE NOTE: VAT and customs are not covered in our shipping collections.

The Finalized PDF and Hardcover Book are estimated to be delivered in July 2024.

nodes.description: A co-op adventure with a fresh take on a classic genre.

nodes.question: How many players can play this game?
nodes.answer: You can play Bubblegum with anywhere from 1 to 4 players, choosing from a variety of playable characters.

nodes.question: What platforms can I play this game on?
nodes.answer: Bubblegum will release on PC, Xbox, Playstation and Nintendo platforms.

nodes.question: Where does the name Bubblegum come from?
nodes.answer: We wanted to choose a project name that embodies the spirit of the game and is a constant reminder of what we are trying to deliver -- a game that is fun, vibrant and meant for everyone to enjoy.

nodes.question: How many characters will be playable at launch?
nodes.answer: Currently, there will be 7 characters playable at launch, 6 for the general public and 1 Kickstarter exclusive.

nodes.question: What does "Pre-production" mean for this project?
nodes.answer: The game has a solid planned base but it is still in the pre-production stage. We spent the last years discussing and refining the game's core and vision with a small group to test and improve its "feel", quality and idea. There is still much to do and many decisions to be made, and they will be shared and influenced by backers of the project.

nodes.question: Why early access?
nodes.answer: We are confident we can deliver a game of great quality at the end of 2024, but we want to continue increasing it, by adding more levels, characters, and narrative with the help of an active player community. We decided that releasing the game in early access was the best way to get it to you, the player, as soon as possible while still having room to improve it with your help.

nodes.question: What is "Early early" access?
nodes.answer: The game will be accessible to the backers who pledge for the "Space Settler" tier and above before the public early access date. These players will see more of the development process and be able to offer feedback and suggestions earlier.

nodes.question: Is Local Pick Up an option?
nodes.answer: We can reimburse if successfully funded for anyone that wants to Pick Up at our office in Burnaby, BC.

nodes.question: How to get my discord title before the surveys are sent?
nodes.answer: If you would like to receive your backer title before the end of the Kickstarter campaign please message us on Kickstarter with your Discord name, tag and number so that we can assign the correct role.

nodes.name: Project Bubblegum
nodes.risks:
We want to reassure you that our studio has extensive experience shipping games of all scopes, and the team is composed of professionals who take great pride in their work.

It is our promise to every backer, that the team here at Emerald City Games will always make sure the funds pledged towards the game go directly towards its development.
nodes.story:
Journey through the galaxy as a squad of space rangers in this dynamic, co-op action-arcade game for up to 4 players!

Project Bubblegum is an online and local couch co-op action-game for up to 4 players. This new spin on a classic genre includes RPG, puzzle and platforming elements all rendered in gorgeous 3D graphics. Explore multiple planets and experience plenty of drama as you take part in an epic space adventure.

  • A Game for Everyone: Inviting visuals, diverse characters, easy to pick up controls and depth in all areas of gameplay. The game is designed to be fun for a wide audience.
  • All New Beat ‘em Up: Classic genre reimagined in 3D with tightly tuned controls and fresh mechanics to create an experience like no other.
  • Couch Co-op: Either online or locally. Enjoy playing with up to four players as you make your way through the campaign together.
  • It’s got ‘The Feel’: Whether it's the first time you play or the last skill you’ve unlocked, controlling your character should always feel responsive with a dance of blocks, dodges, melee, and ranged attacks.
  • Gameplay Depth: While the game is meant to be easy to pick up and play, it’s also important to have systems that allow skill growth. Players are able to continue mastering different aspects as they progress.
  • Unique Characters: Choose from a group of heroes that play, look, and feel very different! Each comes with their own personality and sets of advantages and disadvantages.
  • Curated Experience: No amount of content is procedurally generated. Every beat, level, and narrative element are hand-crafted with a storyline that guides the player through the game.
  • Stylized Visuals: A talented team delivers a cartoonish art style following in the studio’s tradition with special attention to polish, detail and charm to thoughtfully tie in the story and the universe.
  • A Whole New World: ECG’s first original title since Lionheart. Immerse yourself in a space fantasy opera that follows an endearing cast of anthropomorphic characters on a light-hearted and fun adventure!

Planned for release on PC and all major consoles.

The world of Bubblegum is set far into the future… but it's not our future. Wolves, Cats, Reptiles and hundreds of others species struggle to carve out their own niche across thousands of systems collectively called ‘Known Space’.

In the lawless regions known as the Territories, life is harder.  Those planets are beset by pirates, nomad clans, alien monstrosities and worse.  Yet there’s freedom to be had out there, one that lures the bold, the adventurous and, more often than not, those hiding from their past or looking to start afresh.

Among the most dangerous of those is the mercenary group known simply as ‘The Squad’. A group of ex-space rangers, the Squad take on jobs. Some small, some big.  Whatever pays the bills. 

Recently, they’ve been hired to protect a group of miners from a criminal gang. Nothing special.  But this one mission will lead them from a backwater dustball of a planet to the Heart of Known Space and into its darkest shadows where something is stirring.. Something Eons old with one hell of grudge.

Immerse yourself in our sci-fi fantasy setting with an endearing cast of characters that travel across different planets to uncover a conspiracy much deeper than anyone knew. This is a whirlwind of a journey like no other!

Your squad consists of elite ex-space rangers employed by one of the Autocrat houses. Your mission is to escort two nobles to a nearby Moon.

Choose from Sarge, Kali, Valhalla or Kumbaya. Each character has a unique set of attacks, combos and special abilities that complement each other. Use their skills, gear and team strategy to turn the tide against The Nightmare.

  • Intuitive Controls: Players can use light and heavy attacks for different effects. Unlock special inputs to unleash unique abilities that vary from launching an enemy into the air to more situational maneuvers.
  • Deep Combat Mechanics: Dynamic enemies and systems create moments to take advantage. There’s a counterplay to beat each enemy efficiently, and you’re armed with the toolkit to do so, but beware - so are they!
  • Weapon of Choice: Each character has a melee and ranged weapon that play and feel very different. Use either to suit your style or situation and string their attacks together to come up with your own cool combinations!
  • Co-Operative Elements: Helping your friend perform a KO, aiding a fallen ally or performing unique co-op special moves. We’re exploring different cooperative ideas in gameplay.
  • Platforming and Movement: Run, skid, sprint, jump, jetpack and parkour your way around the levels. Focusing on the control of your character has allowed us to create more interesting environments and combat scenarios.
  • Puzzles and Immersion: Exploring a level should be fun and we plan to use these moments to balance the action. Interacting with objects to cool effect and getting to further deliver the narrative through the environment. Interacting with different elements to unlock parts of levels or special rewards makes the levels more engaging and fun. Puzzles and narrative moments balance (and sometimes add to) the action during the game.

Memorable Bosses: Like Bloat! These epic moments are awaiting you at the end of every stage. Ready to put your squad’s combat skills to the test?

The Territories are a cluster of planets home to some dangerous monsters, rogue AI, and greedy outlaws. Join our squad as they embark on an adventure that will take them to all corners of the system and more. What secrets lie within each of these strange and unique lands?

We have many different tiers of rewards that will go directly to the production of Project Bubblegum. Please take a moment to look through the descriptions and check out some of the special items. Please note some rewards are limited, and we also plan to add additional rewards and surprises as the campaign goes. 

Kickstarter Plushies: We have plushies designed for our starting main characters, with plans to add more. Aren't they adorable!?

3D Statue: 4 limited edition toy figures of our main starting characters. Size: 72mm 

Alternate Outfit: Change how your character looks in-game. Currently there is 1 outfit to collect, with the plan to hopefully unlock some more during the campaign.

Emerald City Games was formed in 2008 when two cousins began building games out of their basement. It has since grown to over 70 talented developers and 12 shipped titles. 

A studio that prides itself on an amazing culture and pushing the boundaries in both gameplay and art. We have assembled a team of the most talented developers from across the world to create successful, high quality, award-winning games with amazing visuals and gameplay. We look forward to bringing this new project to life!

The development team Project Bubblegum is composed of many talented individuals from all over the world. Some of the people on the core team include,

Plus many other important members. ECG is a very collaborative studio with many people touching many projects.

Pledge now to be a part of this growing universe and follow us on our social media platforms:

Our studio is new to Kickstarter, but we are veterans of the industry and have been shipping games together for over 15 years. 

This project began with a small team back in 2021 and we've been taking the time to experiment with different elements and flesh out the gameplay, characters and narrative ever since. We want to create an experience like nothing before and something meant to be enjoyed alongside your family or friends.

Our studio is completely independent and currently not able to finance a game like this entirely on our own. Last summer we put together a demo to show off some of the core controls we were happy with and ideally find a publishing partner. It was a little sad hearing how unpopular this genre is nowadays. We love co-op games, and don't think there are enough of them out there. 

After Gamescom, we had to put the project on hold. Maybe permanently. Until we had the idea of sharing it with YOU, the players, to see if there was as much excitement about this type of game as we had. We absolutely adore this world we are creating and badly want to bring these characters to life. But we can't do it without you!

Please keep in mind this game is still in pre-production. There is still a lot of work to do and we want to ensure we can deliver something we are proud of and you will enjoy. We have a solid base planned for the amount with so much more if players are into it. 

Also, all money from Kickstarter will go directly towards the production of the game and we will continue to invest our own funds into this as well. We are SO excited about this title and bringing this new world to life and we want to do it together with the community.

We will plan to release on PC and Console, starting with an Early Access hopefully later this year.

nodes.description: The retro party game for shooting lasers between family members or slicing up friends!

environmentalCommitments.description: The company we have chosen is one of the few that promotes the use of recycled material for us creators, we hope with you to transform this and our future products into goods made from recycled material for the good of our planet.

We have done everything possible to use a rigid box that does not deteriorate over time, furthermore the cards have been designed with a thick edge to resist wear over time. The quality of the papers is also our priority to give you a product that lasts over time.

During the advanced phase of our campaign (spoiler) we would like to propose an upgrade of the cards for a collaboration directly with mother nature! we would like to use completely recycled paper, to do this we would need many backers to lower the price of production which otherwise would be very high, as the cost of such papers is higher. We hope with your help to achieve this goal and make our game cards made of completely recycled paper. for now we are committed to carrying out the project with completely recyclable materials!

Our product will be made of 100% paper! both the rigid box and the cards, even for the add-ons the tokens are in rigid cardboard, and the velcro envelope will guarantee a product that will avoid the use of plastic sachets and will be a product that will be more long-lasting avoiding unnecessary production of sachets of plastic.

We therefore do not have a very precise estimate of when the games will arrive in your homes, but we will do everything possible to respect the times we know from the company and to warn you of any possible changes. for the reasons mentioned above we have in fact pushed ourselves to produce only one main article so as to have a more manageable production, despite this any unforeseen event can happen, but it will be our responsibility to communicate everything to you promptly. For this reason, if you support us in realizing our dream of producing games that we like or if you are just interested in our project and have read up to this point, we would like to say THANK YOU in advance for believing in us. <3
nodes.story:
In this card game with a slightly videogame and slightly retro flavor you will play to send your "friends" into game over. In this fun game you will play as an 8-bit character and use all your cunning to stay on top!

Learn in 5 minutes, play for hours : This boardgame is very easy to learn, each card has very intuitive symbols, and even explaining it will be very easy for you, learn it and explain it in a few minutes, and have fun for hours!

PLEDGE : 

Our game will be in a special release in all pladges where it is sold here on kickstarter. in addition to a large discount inside there will be an exclusive surprise and the possibility of unlocking exclusive SG for the campaign.

WHAT'S INSIDE : 

This exclusive character will only be sold in kickstarter copies, hurry and give a royal touch to your game!

How To Play

Let's see a typical player's turn to understand how to play!

We are already in the most advanced stages, normally we start with 10 cards in our hand, it's our turn, our character is Phanty, we have 3 lives and 2 skill tokens to spend, 1 is absent, it has already been spent in our previous turn.

Since it's the start of the turn, the first thing we have to do is draw a card from the deck and add it to our hand. Then based on the cards in our hand we decide who to target.

We decide to use the bomb card. this card allows us to choose the player who is either to our right or to our left, then that player will have to defend himself by discarding 3 cards or losing 1 life.

Normally a player can use shield cards to defend himself, having few cards in hand however we don't want to risk wasting them and we also activate our ability. 

In particular, Phanty's ability allows our cards not to be avoided and to pass through enemy defenses like a good ghost. This way the opponent loses a life token, but we discard a skill token that we used and the bomb card which goes into the discard pile.

We've finished our turn and now it's the next player's turn!

RULEBOOK : 

Scan or click on the qr code to access the rulebook. this way you can get an in-depth idea of the game!

STRETCH GOAL :

All stretch goals will be announced here, each goal achieved will improve the game and add even more fun, let's unlock them all!

ADD-ON :

You can add other copies of the game or just part of the components in this section.

BGG LINK

THE TEAM : 

And now a little space to introduce ourselves, the major collaborators worked here for the creation of the campaign and the game, I also thank the testers and all the other people who supported me even if they are not below, it is thanks to everyone's work if this and other games I thought of were able to come to life, and I hope they will entertain you too!

WHY KICKSTARTER : 

Choosing to use this medium was the most obvious choice for us, this is the first game that I launch individually, the help of all of you and the platform is what will give me the opportunity to turn my ideas into reality. 

I have always loved board games and I want to share my passion in this way, kickstarter is an excellent choice to let people know our ideas. 

Furthermore, by financing the game on Kickstarter for you there will be exclusives available only here on Kickstarter and you will receive the game before anyone else, and obviously you will also have my most sincere and affectionate thanks for believing in my project from me.

The prices indicated are only indicative, shipping prices vary very often so they cannot be exactly the same. The estimate below is the closest we have for the current period with our shipping partner.
The cost of shipping will only be paid at a later time via Backerkit.

VAT will be charged via the pledge manager after the campaign.

Reviews and videos

If you know Italian you can also follow my interview with the super nice Incanta Dado to find out more about the project. Other reviews or videos will be added in this section.

nodes.question: What is Kickstarter?
nodes.answer: Kickstarter is a launchpad for creators to raise funds for the initial production of their invention. Backers (that's you!) can support the creator by pre-ordering the product at a discounted price.

nodes.question: What does it mean to back a project (pledge)?
nodes.answer: When you back a project, you’re pre-ordering the product. That means you'll get it once it's produced. Besides getting the product itself, you're also joining a community. Follow along the production process, take part in important surveys and give the creator valuable feedback.

nodes.question: How do I pledge?
nodes.answer: In order to pledge, click that green button that says “Back this project”. You'll get to select your shipping country and choose your desired pledge level and reward.

nodes.question: When is my money collected?
nodes.answer: Your money will be collected only after the project ends on Tuesday, February 6th, 2024. If the project is cancelled for any reason, you won't be charged. Shipping fees will be collected separately from your campaign pledge. Estimated shipping costs can be found on our campaign page.

nodes.question: When will I get my pre-order?
nodes.answer: GAMMN is set to ship in May 2024 (June 2024 for the blue board). Depending on your location, you'll get them sometime between mid-May and end of June 2024. Please note that this is an estimate, as you're pre-ordering the product and production delays could arise.

nodes.question: Where do you ship to / from?
nodes.answer:
We are working with Highline Commerce, all products will ship from their warehouse based in Brooklyn, NYC. 
We currently ship to: United States, Canada, EU, Australia, Hong Kong, Japan, Monaco, New Zealand, Norway, Singapore, Switzerland, United Kingdom.

nodes.question: How do I play backgammon?
nodes.answer: Roughly five to ten minutes is all it takes! While there are plenty of resources out there, we are creating a “how to play” video with a bit more production value. By the time our boards ship, our website will be live with a how to play video, as well as come with a printed step by step guide to get you playing fast!

nodes.question: Do you offer a warranty?
nodes.answer: Yes, all GAMMN products come with a limited lifetime warranty. Limited Lifetime Warranty means the manufacturer GAMMN, is offering a guarantee to repair the product if found defective in material or workmanship for as long as the original purchaser owns the product. This guarantee extends to only the first retail purchaser of the product, starting from the date of delivery.

nodes.question: Where is GAMMN made?
nodes.answer: Our board is manufactured locally in New Hampshire. The other components are sourced from overseas.

nodes.name: GAMMN: A Backgammon Board Built to Go Anywhere.
nodes.risks:
We have worked extremely hard to make this product ready for Kickstarter and full-scale manufacturing. We’re confident in our ability to produce our product at quality in mass and fulfill all our perks on time. However, things don’t always go as planned. Here are a few of risks that MAY come up, and if so, our plan to address them:

MANUFACTURING: We have a trusted manufacturer lined up and will have quality assurance people on site during production. Despite this, manufacturing delays can still happen. Whether it’s an unexpected backlog, bad timing with holidays, or a quality assurance issue on the ground floor, we’ll let you know immediately. Our #1 priority is product quality followed by timely delivery. 

FULFILLMENT: Sometimes, stuff happens that can’t be planned for: a supplier misses a deadline, a package gets held up at customs, a shipment gets lost, or a global pandemic shuts down shipping ports around the world. Those things can cause delays. We are using an experienced logistics team to get our products to you. We’ll keep open and honest communication with you through our process so you know where your product is and when it’s going to get to you.
nodes.story:
Meet GAMMN: The Most Adventure-Ready Backgammon Board. Built to Go Anywhere.

GAMMN is here to change what you think about backgammon. We’re shaking off the dust from a game that's been loved for centuries to give it a fresh twist.

Meet GAMMN:

  • Timeless. Backgammon is a game of chance, luck, and skill that has been loved for centuries.
  • Lightweight. No need to strain your back, GAMMN weighs in at 2.35 pounds.
  • Durable. Made from high impact polystyrene, GAMMN is designed to stand the test of time.
  • Classic. We turned to sexy (and sustainable) cork for the inner playing surface.
  • Portable. With our adjustable shoulder strap, GAMMN can accompany you on any adventure - 100% handsfree.
  • Thoughtful details. GAMNN’s setup dots are a game-changer (pun intended) for both novice and seasoned players.

Scroll down for more details!

Timeless.

Backgammon is a game of chance, luck, and skill that anyone can play; which is why it has been loved for centuries. Teaching new players the the rules and tactics of backgammon is all part of the fun, but watch your back, because often times, even the most skilled players can be beat by newbies. Whether playing casually with friends or participating in competitive tournaments, backgammon remains a timeless game that continues to captivate players worldwide.

Lightweight.

From the start, we recognized the importance of making GAMMN lightweight and travel friendly. After careful consideration, we settled on high impact polystyrene as our material choice, as it offers durability without adding any excessive weight. Weighing in at a grand total of 2.35 pounds, the board is deceptively lightweight.

Durable.

The construction of GAMMN is something we took very seriously. We wanted to make sure our boards would stand the test of time, as well as the elements. We leaned into injection molding as our manufacturing process, and after extensive testing, ultimately selected high impact polystyrene as the ideal board material. Additionally, GAMMN’s design features a water & dust resistant seal, making it well-prepared for any adventure. Buy once, play for a lifetime.

Classic.

To honor backgammon’s history as a game for elite players like Roman emperors and Hugh Hefner, we turned to sexy (and sustainable) cork for the inner playing surface. Not only is this an ode to the game’s history, but cork is a super renewable and sustainable material, too. Win-win.

Portable.

Adventure away from the kitchen table and explore new gameplay arenas. Ready to go wherever you are, GAMMN’s adjustable shoulder strap allows for hands free transportation. After all, it’s more fun to celebrate a victory on a boat or at a campsite.

Thoughtful Details.

As avid backgammon players, we are always looking to introduce new players to the game. In this pursuit, we identified one of the most challenging aspects for newcomers: remembering how to set up the board. That's where GAMMN's Setup Dots come into play. These unassuming little dots are a true game-changer (pun intended) for players of all levels. With GAMMN's Setup Dots, you can spend your time playing, not prepping.

The Fine Print.

Specifications:

  • Board Material: High Impact Polystyrene
  • Playing Surface: Cork
  • Dimensions Shut: 13.4" x 10.3" x 1.7"
  • Dimensions Open: 20.3" x 13.4" x .9"
  • Weight: 2.35 pounds (1.07 kg)
  • Checker Material: Resin
  • Checker Demensions: 30mm x 6.5mm
  • Dice Dimensions: 16mm
  • Doubles Cube Dimensions: 19mm
  • Adjustable (& Removable) Shoulder Strap: Min Length: 34" / Max Length: 54"

Design Process.

We have been designing and prototyping GAMMN for over two years now. Every element, from the board to the cork to the handle and strap material, has undergone extensive thought and testing. After countless rounds of prototyping, we have finally landed on a design that we are super stoked about and we hope you are too.

Timeline.

Shipping.

Shipping will be charged after our campaign ends, about two weeks prior to shipping.

The above table represents our estimated shipping costs. These are our very best estimates but they are subject to change based on actual shipping rates at time of fulfillment. Our goal is to make this process as transparent and accurate as possible, without any unexpected changes or fees. 
A couple weeks before we begin fulfillment, you will receive a survey to input your shipping address and securely pay for shipping.
**Please Note: VAT & duties are not included in the above estimates for non-USA orders; your local tariffs/duties will be added onto your final shipping bill. 

We are shipping to as many countries as possible right now. If you do not see your home base listed above, please send us a message so we can add you to a post-campaign contact list, as we hope to be shipping worldwide down the road. 

Stretch Goal.

Why We Are on Kickstarter.

GAMMN is manufactured using a process called injection molding, which requires a large upfront investment before we can begin manufacturing the boards themselves. By supporting our campaign and pre-ordering GAMMN, you will be helping us bring our vision to life. We can’t thank you enough for your support!

About Us.

Ashley and Watt went from casual acquaintances to backgammon buddies when they discovered their shared love for playing, teaching, and, of course, winning the game. Easy enough to learn in minutes, yet challenging enough to inspire healthy competition, they agreed backgammon was the most enjoyable way to form friendships and stay entertained on many outdoor adventures. They realized there was a gap in the market for a stylish, easy-to-use board that could travel anywhere, and just like that, GAMMN was born.

This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 3,500+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $1B raised between them.

This product is designed for DND 5e, which has survived the test of time. Should 5e get updated, this project will get updated as well!

Nothing in this project is really disposable - as stated in "long-lasting design," this product can last on your shelf for many years to come. The battles within can be used and reused in any adventure, statblocks can be modified to fit your table, and the mechanics offer replayablility!

aiDisclosure.otherAiDetails: Every image was worked on or created from scratch by a paid human, and all writing was done by Jason and Josh. Some images and artwork were first drafted with AI for the general feel and atmosphere of the picture, then handed off to an artist who recreated the image or to a graphics designer who redid the image in their style. We find this preferable to handing our artists a poorly drawn MS-paint picture of our idea! The $4,000 goal is to pay our artists.

nodes.name: Drop In Boss Battles and Encounters
nodes.risks: This project is complete, with the stretch rewards easily added. We pride ourselves on ultra-fast fulfillment - the PDF copy will be added to your DriveThruRPG library, and the physical copy will be shipped to you as soon as possible. The print version will also be added to your DriveThruRPG library so that you can print yourself another copy at cost should you need a replacement.
nodes.story:
Elevate your encounters and reduce prep time with Drop in Boss Battles and Encounters! This 144 page book contains interactable terrain, multiple phase bosses, objectives, and special rules to create memorable fights. Reward your players for using creativity, smart positioning, and team tactics. Hook suggestions make these fights easy to drop into any existing campaign, one shot, or session!

Download Sample Battle: The Elemental Tempest (Level 11 Encounter)

Level 1-4 Boss Battles

A Warrior's Death - Help your players learn basic mechanics while giving this knight an honorable death. Magic reward: Breastplate of Honor.

Rats... in a Basement! - A classic fight… with a twist! Magic reward: Pet Draconic Rat.

Ooze Devourer Lab - The party wakes up tied to experimentation tables, with an Ooze after their brains… they should be fine, right?

Goblins at the Gates - Set up your defenses and defend against this horde of goblins! Utilize cover, crowd control, and breaking enemy concentration to win the day. Magic reward: Club of Mind Goblin (lol).

Mimic Storefront - A stakeout in a bird store takes a twist! What’s real? What’s not? It will take more than combat prowess to find out. Magic reward: Summonable Cockatiel.

Level 5-10 Boss Battles

Spell and Sword - Two half-dragon twins encounter the party on a small bridge. Something divine links them together, making them stronger than the sum of their parts. Solve the link to defeat them! Magic rewards: Draconic Scimitar and Draconic Pendant of Power

Rust Monster Rider - The party encounters a Duergar riding a Mutated Rust Monster, doing nefarious deeds at night! Use the open graves and other terrain to avoid their devastating charge attacks! Magic reward: Exotic Saddle

The Hag's Summit - The party has found the culprit behind the region's freezing temperatures and must battle a hag on a perilous mountain top. Don’t fall! Magic reward: The Icy Hand

Something Strange - This house is haunted - navigate its dangers and defeat the paranormal entity(ies) before it is too late! Magic reward: Ghostly Rod of Rulership.

Giant in the Water - The party must engage a Storm Giant while he is waist deep in the ocean before he reaches land. Dodge his electrical attacks and lair actions using water walking and limited land to defeat him! Magic reward: The Lightning Shell

Level 11-16 Boss Battles

The Elemental Tempest - Four elementals vie for supremacy in a ritual gone wrong. Control which Elemental is the Tempest to change the battlefield and gain the buffs you want! Magic reward: Unstable Planar Shard

Megalodon Boat Attack - The party’s journey by boat is met with an unwelcome visitor. Utilize the boat’s mechanics or your own abilities to stop a fearsome Megalodon from sinking the ship in a crazy DPS race!

The Rising Tide - A nefarious group of Sahuagin have taken important members of the town's Admiralty hostage. Act fast to save them, or the coast is doomed! Magic reward: Reaper of the Tides (Trident).

Summoning the Beyond - A Gnoll Necromancer has unlocked supreme power. Stop his ritual before his summon completes, and the Dracolich comes to life! Magic reward: The Deathly Ring of Power.

Night Out Assassins: Gala Ambush - Red Wedding your players. They deserve it! Magic reward: Assassin's Blade.

Level 17-20 Boss Battles

Rampage of the Machines - Defend a town using their lair actions to help you bring down a Mechanical Hydra before it destroys everything! Magic reward: The Clockwork Heart.

The Profane Sacrifice - A demon is ascending to near godhood through a profane ritual. Stop the ritual by any means necessary before he becomes too powerful and kills reality itself! Magic reward: Sword of the Demon King Aspirant

They Have Awakened - A Titan older than the world itself has been unchained. It cannot be killed - only anchored back into its prison. Use the city's defenders in this epic, larger-than-life battle to plant the anchors and drag him back where he came from! 

A Wizard's Revenge - An evil wizard has created a power-rangers-esque giant golem and is terrorizing the countryside. Infiltrate the golem and defeat this epic-level caster before it is too late! Magic rewards: Used Robe of the Archmagi, Ioun Stone of Mastery, Used Staff of the Magi.

The Dance of the Divine - We saved the best for last... Hee hee! The King of Pop is back… with a vengeance! Use smart tactics and slick dance moves to become the new Lord of the Dance in this thriller of a fight. Magic reward: The Golden Slippers. This fight has been scaled for all levels!

A Map for Every Battle

Each fight comes with a map specifically designed for the battle's mechanics. These will be each offered as a separate download within your DriveThruRPG library for easy VTT use and so that you can use them for other encounters or campaigns as needed!

57 Stat Blocks of Dangerous Enemies

Fight massive titans, demon lord ascendants, mechanical hydras, megalodons... the list goes on and on! The more complicated battles include tips and tricks for getting the most out of the stat blocks to help you utilize different combos to surprise your players!

Unique Encounter Mechanics

Without spoiling too much, some battles involve: 

  • Escaping from tables before being able to fight
  • Using harpoon guns and teamwork to load, aim, and shoot
  • Abusing cover rules against enemy ranged attacks
  • Defeating bosses in a certain order to trigger special effects
  • Fighting possessed objects
  • Avoiding knockback abilities by using terrain
  • Defeating pieces of a boss to debuff him as a whole
  • Dealing with hostage-killing devices
  • Destroying lair objects to debuff an enemy
  • Using player-given lair actions to stop giants
  • A dance battle against a Mummy Lord and his Backup Dancers

Mechanics are explained thoroughly so that the DM can easily convey them to the party in character. We do not keep the obvious to ourselves, and we may repeat ourselves, but by doing so we want everyone to have fun!

20 Magic Item Rewards

Most battles include one or more magic items that are thematic to the encounter and create memories associated with the battle. For example, a draconic rat companion can join you after completing Rats... In a Basement! And we know players love npc companions! Other items include thematic weapons, armor, and magic devices that can positively affect your campaign going forward.

Reward Tiers

Goblin Slayer, $25: PDF and Maps. Receive a high-quality PDF with all of the battles and the map files in your DriveThruRPG library.

Orc Slayer, $40: Contains a PDF of every book we've created so far! Drop In Boss Battles, Midnight Mayhem, and Hoopdy's Magical Emporium.

Early Bird, $49: Only available for 48 hours! Contains the PDF, Hardcover, Maps, all stretch goals, all at a discount! Not only that, but we throw in Hoopdy's Magical Emporium, FREE

Elemental Battler, $55: The juiciest of combos! Contains the PDF, Hardcover, Maps, and all stretch goals!

Leopard Printer, $75: Get everything in the Elemental Battler alongside our previous release, Midnight Mayhem! Includes PDF and Softcover of this Thieves Guild Adventure. Also includes Hoopdy's Magical Emporium.

Become An NPC Miniboss, $250. This tier gives you access to all Leopard Printer rewards along with acknowledgement in our book, and the opportunity to have your character be part of the Greatest Dance Battle Encounter of All Time! You provide the name and a 30-word blurb, and we'll add your character as a back up dancer in the final fight of the book, Dance of the Divine!

Retailer, $375: Receive 10 hardcover copies to put on your shelves! Shipping is included in the up-front cost. US-retailers only.

Double Retailer, $475: Receive 10 hardcover copies of Drop In Boss Battles and 10 copies of Midnight Mayhem for your shelves! Shipping is included in the up-front cost. US-retailers only.

Addon: Hoopdy's Magical Emporium, $5: This traveling magic item shop contains items to help adventuring parties in need!
 

Magical Shop Addon: Hoopdy's Magical Emporium

What’s this? MORE drop in content? Why not?!

Charlatan, opportunist… Hoopdy has been called many things, but one thing is for certain - his magical shop shows up just in time to help with your trials ahead!

Hoopdy’s magical cart can show up at any time, but it has a knack for finding adventuring parties in the oddest and most remote places (hence why he’s called an opportunist!). His plethora of magic items range from powerful (but dangerous) potions such as “Lemonade That (Potentially) Kills You™” to magical drugs that give your party the benefit of a long rest! Other services also exist, but we’ll reveal those in time!

This short addon will be available FOR FREE to early backers of the Early Bird Pledge, which is available for the first 48 hours. Otherwise, you can add it on for $5!

Up Front Shipping Costs

Because we utilize DriveThruRPG, we know our shipping costs ahead of time. Here are they are!

USA: $5
Australia: $12
Canada: $18
Finland: $11
France: $9
Germany: $8
Greece: $13
Mexico: $6
United Kingdom: $6
All Other Countries: $7

If adding Midnight Mayhem softcover to your order, add $2 to the shipping cost.

Add to Your DriveThruRPG Library and Have Access Forever (Print on Demand!)

Both physical and PDF versions of the book will be added to your DriveThruRPG account, meaning you can download the book any time you want! And because the hardcover is also Print on Demand, if you want an extra copy of the hardcover, you can have one printed at cost and shipped to you at any time! Any updates to the book will also be updated in your digital library so that any addons or changes will be in the document as well.

Fulfillment Timelines

PDF: The book is complete, and adding the extra NPCs will take no time at all. Once your survey is complete, and Kickstarter has paid us, we will ship out the digital version.

Physical Book: We have the first draft of the physical copy in our hands (see above!) and are working out some of the kinks with it to make sure that it looks great on your table! During the campaign, we will get another draft printed. Once that is good to go, we should be able to put the finishing touch on it and start shipping the book a few weeks after the campaign has ended. This is highly subject to change as there could still be errors in the physical copy, which will require another 2 weeks to get a draft sent to us. We expect DriveThruRPG to take about 2-3 weeks to ship once we have placed the order in for the book.

As you travel through the forest, the shrieks and cries of a young owl pierce the air. You follow the sounds to a small clearing, where a baby Owlbear struggles inside of a bear trap. Two hunters emerge from the brush and make themselves known. “Hey, get down! You don’t want to be seen here when the mother shows up!”

As you lounge about the library, you begin to feel intense heat coming from the front door. Smoke slowly builds up around the door, and with one loud crash, it disintegrates into a pile of ash. A 10 ft tall Efreeti stands where the door once was, brandishing a massive scimitar. Flanking him are 6 Salamanders burning with intense rage. The Efreeti points his sword forward. “Burn everything! Leave nothing but ash!” The Salamanders slither forward, obeying the command. 

This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 3,500+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $1B raised between them.

nodes.description: 50+ Unique Drop-in Businesses and Trades for your TTRPG
